craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship That Stands the Test of Time
craftsmanship.description: At VikAno Furniture, we believe that true craftsmanship lies in the details. Each piece of furniture is handcrafted by skilled artisans who have honed their craft over decades.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Materials
sustainable.description: We source our wood from sustainable forests and reclaimed sources.

traditional.title: Traditional Techniques
traditional.description: We employ time-honored woodworking techniques that ensure durability.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Each piece can be customized to suit your specific needs and preferences.

calculator.title: Furniture Cost Calculator
calculator.description: Use our calculator to estimate the cost of your custom furniture project.
calculator.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Prices shown are approximate and for orientation purposes only. The final price may vary based on specific requirements, materials availability, and complexity of the design. Please contact us for an accurate quote.
calculator.furnitureType: What would you like to build?

result.approximatePrice: This is an approximate price. The final cost may vary based on specific design requirements, additional features, and materials availability.

included.title: What's Included
included.materials: Premium quality materials based on your selection

materialsInfo.title: Materials Information
materialsInfo.turkish: Turkish Material: Affordable and durable option for budget-conscious projects.
materialsInfo.austrianBelarusian: Austrian & Belarusian Material: Mid-range materials offering excellent quality-to-price ratio.
materialsInfo.italianSpanish: Italian & Spanish Material: Premium materials with superior durability, finish, and aesthetic appeal.
materialsInfo.note: All our furniture comes with quality mechanisms, hinges, and slides regardless of material choice.

footer.description: Handcrafted furniture made with passion and dedication. Every piece tells a story of craftsmanship and quality.

seo.title: VikAno Furniture - Custom Furniture in Tbilisi, Georgia
seo.description: VikAno Furniture offers premium custom-made furniture, kitchens, closets, and cottage solutions in Tbilisi, Georgia. Handcrafted with quality materials and professional installation.
seo.keywords: custom furniture, wooden furniture, handmade furniture, kitchen cabinetry, closets, wardrobes, bedroom furniture, interior design, Tbilisi, Georgia, premium furniture, custom cabinets

about.title: About VikAno
about.description: Our company specializes in the custom manufacturing of furniture, cottages, and kitchen interiors.
about.missionText: At VikAno, our mission is to transform spaces through exceptional craftsmanship and personalized design.
about.ctaText: Let us help you create furniture and interiors that perfectly suit your needs and reflect your personality.
